issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Switch WebHCat to use beeline to submit Hive queries

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: It will be useful for some clients to get the url list when beeline-site is present.
fields.summary: Beeline: Add a utility command to retrieve all uris from beeline-site.xml
